description: Fujiwara Bunta is the owner of a tofu shop in Akina, and the father of http://anidb.net/ch9199 [Takumi]. He used to be the No.1 downhill racer in Mt. Akina years ago, but he no longer races, preferring to guide Takumi`s racing development. He is the original driver of the mysterious "white ghost of Akina" AE86 Sprinter Trueno that holds the record of the fastest downhill time at Akina.
name: Fujiwara Bunta
